name: Lil Sal Vs. The Germs 2
description: Lil Sal Vs. The Germs 2 is the official sequel to " Lil Sal Vs. The Germs". In the sequel, Lil Sal has to blast away a new group of stronger colorful germs! This time his Mother is here to help him! In addition to having help, they both have a cool superpower! Lil Sal can blast a bolt of lightning and his Mother can blast a big red heart when their power meter is full!
